author: simonetripodi
msg: According to what discussed and agreed on ML, stack-based pool/factory can be removed, since 'lifo' flag in G(K)OP(F) can get the same behavior

author: rpluem
msg: * Fix r1039304 and make the patch similar to the one proposed for
2.2.x: If the SSL handshake to the backend fails we cannot even
sent an HTTP request. So the check needs to happen already when
we sent data not when we receive data.
